  • Method Details

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach public void setUp()
      This is the before method (fixture) for testing, which will run before any other test function is being executed. This is used to instantiate the Class which this tests.

    • tearDown

      @AfterEach public void tearDown()
      This is the after method (fixture) for testing, which will run after any other test function is being executed. This is used to deallocate the member variables.

    • testLoadMap

      @Test public void testLoadMap()
      This test function tests the loadMap function with multiple criteria.

      This test function tests the addPlayer function with multiple players being added to the game.

    • testRemovePlayer

      @Test public void testRemovePlayer()
      This test function tests the removePlayer function with multiple players being added first and then remove them from the game.
